verses.verse: <S%H1288>Look!<s%> Praise <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all you <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H5975>stand<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house!<s%>
May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you from <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> even he who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
